name: Shasm
body:
Usage
sh shasm.sh <name_of_source_file> <name_of_executable>
						OR
./shasm.sh <name_of_source_file> <name_of_executable>

shasm works on Linux and Mac OS X. Requires Xcode on Mac OS X. May work any other shell having as and ld installed on the system.
This is Free Software as defined by Under GPL V2, further details within LICENSE file. 

Please feel free to contact me at any point, if you face any difficulties or have a question for me. 
Contact me at laerdevstudios@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
